Comment: China is in a *far* better bargaining position than the US, because they've taken the untold billions, maybe trillions, of dollars we've pumped into their economy, and invested into themselves.   People have derided China for being "the world's factory" for decades now, and now they're laughing all the way to the bank.   China can afford to sit back and let the US sweat, and the Trump admin is acting like they've got China right where they want them. It'd be hilarious in how performative it is, if that false bravado wasn't going to hurt an overwhelming majority of the US population.
Author: DocShocker

Comment: Exactly. Another interesting point is that China is culturally very integrated. When they think of themselves as 'Chinese' they don't think 'I am Chinese because I was born in this particular place', they think about an identity going back *millennia*.  Trump thinks that the US stopping imports from China will generate a massive uproar inside of the country, which will make the Chinese government buckle at the knees and come asking for forgiveness. What he doesn't realize is that cultural identity, norms, and the iron fist of the CCP make sure that's not gonna happen at all. There's literally no reason whatsoever for the CCP to come pleading, but on the other hands there's a million reasons why the CCP *wants* the US to become more isolated. It's all upsides for them.  So yeah, Trump is a very stupid man, and Americans are about to learn a very important lesson about electing idiots just because they sound 'tough'.
Author: HarwellDekatron
